summary: "Somewhere in Palilula" tells the story of Serafim, a fresh graduate of a medical school, in 60's Romania. He is brought by destiny to the strange town of Palilula. Nowhere, that is. ... See full summary »
cast: Anne Marie Chertic|Constantin Chiriac|Paul Chiributa|Mihai Chirila|Constantin Cicort|Ana Ciontea|George Costea|Gabriel Costin|Pusa Darie|Áron Dimény|Luminita Erga|Diana Fufezean|Alexandru Georgescu|Constantin Ghenescu|Doina Ghitescu|Adrian Hostiuc|Romanita Ionescu|Iulia Lazar|Sorin Leoveanu|Horatiu Malaele|Gabriel Manescu|Marius Manole|Adrian Matioc|George Mihaita|Vali Mihali|Olivia Nita|Ofelia Popii|Silviu Purcarete|Angel Rababoc|Adriana Schiopu|Cristian Stanca|Andi Stefanescu|Florentina Tilea|Razvan Vasilescu|Pali Vecsei|Ema Vetean
title: Undeva la Palilula
